context: Intelligent data infrastructure for AI era. NetApp recognized as 2025 Gartner Customers' Choice with 98% recommendation rate. Frost & Sullivan named NetApp 2024 Global Company of the Year in hybrid cloud storage. Focus on AI workloads and intelligent data infrastructure. Market dominated by cloud providers (Amazon S3 83.29%, Azure 9.14%), with NetApp holding 1.25% market share competing against 166 tools. Strategic shift with Flexera acquiring Spot FinOps business in early 2025.

competitors.name: Amazon S3
competitors.notes: Dominant cloud storage provider with 83.29% market share in enterprise data storage category

competitors.name: Microsoft Azure Blob Storage
competitors.notes: Second largest cloud storage with 9.14% market share

competitors.name: Dell Technologies (Dell EMC)
competitors.notes: Top traditional storage competitor with PowerMax, Unity XT, and comprehensive portfolio

competitors.name: Pure Storage
competitors.notes: All-flash storage leader with Evergreen model, known for simplicity and performance

competitors.name: Hewlett Packard Enterprise
competitors.notes: Major competitor with storage arrays and data management solutions

competitors.name: Hitachi Vantara
competitors.notes: Reliability-focused with Virtual Storage Platform (VSP) for mission-critical apps

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Enterprise storage solutions and hybrid cloud offerings

competitors.name: Oracle
competitors.notes: Integrated storage and cloud infrastructure solutions

competitors.name: Nutanix
competitors.notes: Hyper-converged infrastructure and cloud software platform

competitors.name: Cloudian
competitors.notes: Data management software for hybrid cloud specializing in object storage

competitors.name: Superna
competitors.notes: Unstructured data management with AI-enabled security and ransomware protection
